data.what-is-the-jupyter-notebook#What is the:
The Jupyter Notebook is an interactive computing environment that enables users to author notebook documents that include:
Live code Interactive widgets Plots Narrative text Equations Images Video These documents provide a complete and self-contained record of a computation that can be converted to various formats and shared with others using email, version control systems (like Git/GitHub ) or nbviewer.jupyter.org .
